quote: This is the strangest life I have ever known.
author: Jim Morrison

quote: Jonesing [10w] Is it odd of me that I'm Jonsesing for strange?
author: Beryl Dov

quote: Am I weird?""Yeah. But so what? Everybody's weird.
author: Stephen King,  Different Seasons

quote: all appears to change when we change
author: Henri-Frédéric Amiel

quote: All things are strange which are worth knowing.
author: Catherynne M. Valente,  In the Cities of Coin and Spice

quote: I used to think anyone doing anything weird was weird. Now I know that it is the people that call others weird that are weird.
author: Paul McCartney

quote: It’s strange how things can change back as suddenly as they changed originally. When one thing happens and suddenly, things are back to normal.
author: Stephen Chbosky,  The Perks of Being a Wallflower

quote: Because this is the way things are meant to be.(Press Tilton)
author: D.J. MacHale

quote: Dead. Never been that before. Not even once.
author: Jasper Fforde,  First Among Sequels

quote: When the going gets weird, the weird turn professional.
author: Hunter S. Thompson,  Fear and Loathing on the Campaign Trail '72

quote: We all know interspecies romance is weird.
author: Tim Burton

quote: I do love nothing in the world so well as you- is not that strange?
author: William Shakespeare,  Much Ado About Nothing

quote: Almost everything strange washes up near Miami.
author: Rick Riordan

quote: Sometimes I can't figure designers out. It's as if they flunked human anatomy.
author: Erma Bombeck

quote: Strange is our situation here on Earth. Each of us comes for a short visit, not knowing why, yet sometimes seeming to divine a purpose. From the standpoint of daily life, however, there is one thing we do know: that man is here for the sake of other men - above all for those upon whose smiles and well-being our own happiness depends.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Some are born weird, some achieve it, others have weirdness thrust upon them.
author: Dick Francis,  To the Hilt

quote: Other than the voices in my head, I think I’m pretty normal.
author: Tom Upton,  Tiny Voices

quote: Your status has changed. Your Name is changed! You are a new creation.
author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu,  The Prince and the Pauper

quote: Too many locks, not enough keys.
author: Sarah Dessen

quote: It is either coincidence piled on top of coincidence,"said Hollus, "or it is deliberate design.
author: Robert J. Sawyer,  Calculating God

quote: The beautiful is always bizarre.
author: Charles Baudelaire

quote: I don't know why it should be, I am sure; but the sight of another man asleep in bed when I am up, maddens me.
author: Jerome K. Jerome,  Three Men in a Boat

quote: It kills me how these days everyone has clinical justification for their strangeness.
author: Miguel Syjuco,  Ilustrado

quote: Every weirdo in the world is on my wavelength.
author: Thomas Pynchon

quote: Good days, they come around the oddest corners.
author: Colum McCann,  Let the Great World Spin

quote: It's a black and white issue: gray is grey, and there's no two ways about it.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: I discover myself on the verge of a usual mistake.
author: Walt Whitman,  Song of Myself

quote: Normal is an illusion. What is normal for the spider is chaos for the fly.
author: Charles Addams

quote: I never saw a wild thing sorry for itself
author: D.H. Lawrence

quote: It's strange because sometimes, I read a book, and I think I am the people in the book.
author: Stephen Chbosky,  The Perks of Being a Wallflower

quote: Nothing is ever certain.
author: Alice Sebold,  The Lovely Bones

quote: We're all a little weird. And life is a little weird. And when we find someone whose weirdness is compatible with ours, we join up with them and fall into mutually satisfying weirdness — and call it love — true love.
author: Robert Fulghum,  True Love

quote: We’re all a little weird. And life is a little weird. And when we find someone whose weirdness is compatible with ours, we join up with them and fall into mutually satisfying weirdness—and call it love—true love.
author: Robert Fulghum,  True Love

quote: Heterosexuality is not normal, it's just common.
author: Dorothy Parker

quote: No, Miss Palmer. What is bizarre is that I currently have a vagina.
author: Karen Chance,  Curse the Dawn

quote: Maybe there is a beast… maybe it's only us.
author: William Golding,  Lord of the Flies

quote: God has arranged strange ways for some of us to find him. Sometimes He brings us on long physical journeys; sometimes He leaves us at home and makes the journey internal. Yours has been both. You have gone a long way and struggled a great deal, but I can see from your eyes that it was not for nothing.
author: Abigail J. Hartman,  The Soldier's Cross

quote: Because he sounded so lost-the Eric I knew had never been one to do anything other than assume others should serve him-I patted around under the covers for his hand. When I found it, I slid my own over it. His palm was turned up to meet my palm, and his fingers clasped mine. And though I would not have thought it possible to go to sleep holding hands with a vampire, that's exactly what I did.
author: Charlaine Harris,  Dead to the World

quote: Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results.
author: Narcotics Anonymous

quote: Maybe some things aren't meant to be known. maybe there just meant to be accepted.
author: Wendy Mass,  Jeremy Fink and the Meaning of Life

quote: When I look at my old pictures, all I can see is what I used to be but am no longer. I think: What I can see is what I am not.
author: Aleksandar Hemon,  The Lazarus Project

quote: I do not like odd things until I can understand them.
author: Robert Jordan,  The Great Hunt

quote: Somebody knows.
author: Ally Carter

quote: What a strange world this would be if we all had the same sense of humor.
author: Bernard Williams

quote: You climbed into my window in the middle of the night. So, either you're some kind of Vampire or some kind of Perv. Which is it?
author: Kami Garcia,  Beautiful Creatures

quote: A withered maple leaf has left its branch and is falling to the ground; its movements resemble those of a butterfly in flight. Isn't it strange? The saddest and deadest of things is yet so like the gayest and most vital of creatures?
author: Ivan Turgenev,  Fathers and Sons

quote: All of sudden, this shooting star went by, and all I could think was that they were listening to us somehow.
author: Nicholas Sparks

quote: What a strange thing!to be alivebeneath cherry blossoms.
author: Kobayashi Issa,  Poems

quote: We are unusual and tragic and alive.
author: Dave Eggers

quote: Maybe before you die, it's your ghosts you see.
author: Lauren Oliver,  Before I Fall
